title: I'll Never Know if I Would Have Gotten the Same Results If I'd Been Nice: Terror Firma
description: I'LL NEVER KNOW IF I WOULD HAVE GOTTEN THE SAME RESULTS IF I'D BEEN NICE - Verna Gillis, 73, continues her search for those liners that make you laugh and identify with the comedic terror firma of still being alive. A work of funny non fiction.
author: Verna Gillis
